screen_desc: The screenshot is from the Google Play Store, showing the Yahoo Mail app. The app has a rating of 4.5 stars based on 6 million reviews and has been downloaded 100 million times. The description mentions that the app offers organized and customized email, with the option to control video autoplay in settings. There is also a suggestion to install other apps like Adobe Acrobat Reader and Microsoft Office.

action_desc: Scroll up to access the app drawer or app list.
action_result: By clicking on the menu icon, you went back to the main menu of the Google Play Store. This is necessary because to install the HBO Max: Stream TV & Movies app, you first need to find it in the App Store. This step helps you to complete your request for installation of the app.
